recommendations.name: Nvidia Corporation
risks: Competition from AMD MI400, hyperscaler custom chips
recommendations.justification: PEG ratio 0.73 suggests undervaluation; Blackwell/Rubin cycle; 92% analyst buy ratings

recommendations.name: Broadcom Inc
risks: VMware market share erosion (70% to 40% by 2029)
Margin compression as AI mix increases
recommendations.justification: $73B AI backlog; deals with all major AI players; 31x forward P/E with 52% growth

recommendations.name: Micron Technology
risks: Up 300% in 6 months - priced for perfection
recommendations.justification: Excellent company but terrible entry point. Wait for pullback to $350-400 range.

recommendations.name: Marvell Technology
risks: Potential Trainium 3/4 design losses to Alchip
recommendations.justification: 35% below 52-week high; PEG 0.79; $75B design pipeline; management disputes customer loss claims

recommendations.name: Meta Platforms
risks: $115-135B capex in 2026 with uncertain AI ROI
recommendations.justification: Cheapest Mag-7 at 28x P/E; $200B revenue growing 22%; Advantage+ at $60B run rate

recommendations.name: Amazon.com
risks: AWS losing share to Azure (growing 2x faster)
recommendations.justification: P/E 68% below 10-year average; AWS reaccelerating at 20.2%; AI revenue doubling to $17B

recommendations.name: Microsoft Corporation
recommendations.justification: Cheapest Mag-7 on forward P/E; 22% below ATH post-selloff; $625B backlog

recommendations.name: CrowdStrike Holdings
recommendations.justification: 97% retention post-outage proves stickiness; Next-Gen SIEM growing 95% YoY; 20% off highs

recommendations.name: Palo Alto Networks
recommendations.justification: Trades at half of CrowdStrike's valuation; platformization validated; 69% FCF margin

recommendations.name: Vistra Corp
risks: Regulatory risk from policy responses to tech energy use
recommendations.justification: 20-year Meta nuclear deal for 2,600MW; existing nuclear fleet is cheapest power

recommendations.name: Talen Energy
recommendations.justification: AWS deal through 2042 for 1,920MW nuclear power; EPS projected +300% in 2026

recommendations.name: Cameco Corporation
recommendations.justification: #2 uranium producer globally; $80B govt nuclear pact; 47% EPS growth in 2026

recommendations.name: Vertiv Holdings
recommendations.justification: $9.5B backlog; 60% order growth YoY; critical power infrastructure for AI

recommendations.name: Seagate Technology
recommendations.justification: HAMR technology leader (years ahead of WDC); sold out through 2027-28; 11x 2026 earnings

recommendations.name: Oracle Corporation
recommendations.justification: Balance sheet too risky. OpenAI dependency creates binary outcome. Wait for clarity.

recommendations.name: Western Digital
risks: Trading above analyst targets after +290% rally
recommendations.justification: Wait for pullback to $200-220. Prefer STX for HDD exposure.

recommendations.name: Constellation Energy
recommendations.justification: Prefer VST and TLN for better risk/reward in nuclear space.

recommendations.name: GE Vernova
recommendations.justification: Good company but limited upside at current levels. Already priced in.
